Text.Page:
I'm the b-bravest impâ€”sneaky and b-brave! Mysterium wants me to climb the strange argon devices and leave b-bombs. I can sneak past argons, no problem. B-but the sabertooths, they can smell me.

Would you stop the sabertooths from smelling for a while, and can you hurry? Mysterium said something about time b-being important.
